LIST.name: SDCard

CMD.body: $ dd if=/dev/zero of=/dev/mmcblk%mmc% bs=1k seek=768 conv=fsync count=8
$ dd if=$FILE of=/dev/mmcblk%mmc% bs=1k seek=1 conv=fsync

LIST.name: Quad Nor Flash
LIST.desc: Choose Quad Nor flash as media
LIST.CMD: Converting ascii value to hex file

LIST.name: SDCard SDK20

CMD.body: $ dd if=$FILE of=/dev/mmcblk%mmc% bs=1k seek=1 skip=1

LIST.CMD: write SDK2.0 image to SD card

LIST.name: SDCard Erase

CMD.body: $ dd if=/dev/zero of=/dev/mmcblk%mmc% bs=1k seek=1 conv=fsync count=1

LIST.CMD: clear image vector table in sd card

LIST.name: Quad Nor Flash SDK20
LIST.desc: Choose Quad Nor flash as media

CMD.body: $ SIZE=`ls -l $FILE | awk '{ print $5 }'`; SIZE=`expr $SIZE / 65536`; SIZE=`expr $SIZE + 1`; flash_erase /dev/mtd0 0 $SIZE
$ dd if=$FILE of=/dev/mtd0 bs=1k seek=4 skip=4

LIST.CMD: write SDK2.0 image to qspi flash
Converting ascii value to hex file

LIST.name: Quad Nor Flash Erase
LIST.desc: Choose Quad Nor flash as media

CMD.body: $ dd if=/dev/zero of=/dev/mmcblk%mmc% bs=1k seek=768 conv=fsync count=8
$ dd if=$FILE of=/dev/mmcblk%mmc% bs=1k seek=1 conv=fsync
$ dd if=/dev/zero of=/dev/mmcblk%mmc% bs=1k seek=768 conv=fsync count=8
$ dd if=/dev/zero of=/dev/mmcblk%mmc% bs=1k seek=768 conv=fsync count=8
$ dd if=$FILE of=/dev/mmcblk%mmc% bs=1k seek=1 conv=fsync
